general.name: NetLogix - Monitor Privileged Group Changes [WIN]
general.description:
Checks if groups such as Domain Admins, Enterprise Admins, etc has new users in them, and alerts if a user has been added. Requires Active Directory services to be running.
Supported OS: Server 2012R2 and up.
Related blog: https://www.cyberdrain.com/monitoring-with-powershell-chapter-3-monitoring-user-creation/

variable.name: usrInterval
variable.description: Interval this monitor is configured to run (Minutes) 60 = 1 Hour 1440 = 1 Day
